front.title: Securing RPSL Objects with RPKI Signatures

abstract.t: This document describes a method to allow parties to electronicallysign RPSL-like objects and validate such electronic signatures. Thisallows relying parties to detect accidental or maliciousmodifications on such objects. It also allows parties who runInternet Routing Registries or similar databases, but do not yet haveRPSS-like authentication of the maintainers of certain objects, toverify that the additions or modifications of such database objectsare done by the legitimate holder(s) of the Internet resourcesmentioned in those objects.
